Metadata.title: Ambrosia | Greek Restaurant in Rueckersdorf near Nuremberg
Metadata.description: Authentic Greek dining in Rueckersdorf. Gyros, Souvlaki, seafood and Greek specialties.
Metadata.ogDescription: Enjoy authentic Greek cuisine in a cozy atmosphere. Your Greek restaurant in Rueckersdorf.

Manifest.description: Greek restaurant in Rückersdorf near Nuremberg. Authentic Greek cuisine, fresh ingredients and warm hospitality.

HomePage.description: At Ambrosia Restaurant, every dish is a tribute to Greek tradition and every moment is crafted for today. We unite the warmth of Greek hospitality, the richness of timeless flavors, and the spirit of modern life.

MenuPage.metaDescription: Discover our Greek specialties: Gyros, Souvlaki, fresh fish and more. Authentic Greek cuisine in Rueckersdorf.

Gallery.galleryDescription: Authentic Greek cuisine in the heart of Rueckersdorf
Gallery.alt1: Amethystos Greek red wine at Restaurant Ambrosia Rueckersdorf
Gallery.alt2: Garides shrimp with rice - Greek seafood specialty
Gallery.alt3: Skordopsomo - Greek garlic bread fresh from the oven
Gallery.alt4: Souvlaki with calamari and rice - Greek grilled dish
Gallery.alt6: Cozy atmosphere at Restaurant Ambrosia Rueckersdorf
